summary: Adds 3 elven companions to the game.
descriptionHtml:
~ Eerie Elves ~ 

Adds 3 companions: 

Artemis (the Wild)
 - Wood Elf
 - Ranger

Hel (the Shadow)
 - Dark Elf
 - Assassin

Siren (the Demoniac)
 - High Elf
 - Mage

You can find them in Whiterun (I believe it\'s called the Cloud District). 

I\'ve briefly tested them, and the mod seems to be working. They should hopefully work just like any other normal follower. Siren may be a bit overpowered, she has a vampire Drain spell, just a heads up. 

This was an attempt at a simple first mod for me, and I decided to share it. Hope you find it useful/enjoyable! It was made with \"Better Females by Bella\" in mind, and will go well with \"Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set\", for example.  To have several companions simultaneously, use Multiple Followers (http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1345602-wiprel-multiple-followers)



Thanks to Blackie for his tutorial.
author: SuperErik
